pr_title: Optimize: parallel attestations validation on block import

timeline.message: Move test helper attestation aggregation methods from the jmh-benchmark module to test-support
For block import test: increase the number of validators to have non-empty committee, speed up chain setup by disabling deposits verify, add tests importing blocks with attestations

timeline.bodyText:
Not critical, but would we be better off using allMatch(is_valid_indexed_attestation(...)) here? I suspect the stream bails out if one thread throws an exception anyway but allMatch makes it a bit more explicit and then we can just check the result instead of catching the exception.
Could even use .filter(!is_valid_indexed_attestation).findAny() and include actual information about which attestation we found was invalid...
timeline.author: ajsutton

replies.bodyText:
